##    Update parishes - Nov 2025

```{r}

library(tidyverse)

path <- "/home/ajackson/Dropbox/Rprojects/TexasDioceseCreationCare/Data/"

google_crs <- "EPSG:4326" # lat long

Parishes <- readRDS(paste0(path, "Parishes.rds"))  

Parishes[Parishes$ID==152,]$Label <- "All Saints'" 

#################################
# Autry House Houston
#################################
sfc = sf::st_sfc(sf::st_point(c(-95.39642748798482, 29.716510149082165)))
sf::st_geometry(sfc)
sf::st_crs(sfc) <- google_crs

Parishes <- Parishes %>% 
  add_row(ID = 166,
          Label = "Autry House",
          City = "Houston",
          Name = "Autry House: The Episcopal Mission to Rice University",
          Description = "6221 Main Street, Houston, TX 77030",
          Convocation = "East Harris",
          County = "Harris",
          geometry = sfc,
          Zip = "77030",
          Address = "6221 Main Street, Houston, TX 77030")
```
